description:
"""Stick with me. I'll make you happy."" 
Aboard the luxury liner, you and Ota are in the throes of premarital bliss. Wedding preparations are going smoothly, but not for long... A possible pregnancy, and Ota's business ambitions threaten to derail your plans! Overcome the trials awaiting you on the high seas and reaffirm your love..."
name: Engagement Cruise: Ota
